Package com.composum.pages.commons.filter

Class DropZoneFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.composum.sling.core.filter.ResourceFilter.AbstractResourceFilter
      • com.composum.pages.commons.filter.DropZoneFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.composum.sling.core.filter.ResourceFilter
    public class DropZoneFilter
extends com.composum.sling.core.filter.ResourceFilter.AbstractResourceFilter
    a filter implementation which is using resource filter keys of the set of filters configured in the module configuration to support the determination of the right DnD target drop zones for a dragged resource (asset or component)
